0.3.1.name: wordpress/hide-option-for-ozhs-admin-drop-down-menu
0.3.1.description:
Only use this plugin if you already have Ozh's Admin Drop Down Menu installed.

Ozh's Admin Drop Down Menu is a great ui option But it should be an option that does not effect every author, editor and admin on a website

If you like this plug-in please give it a five star rating, blog about it, Tweet about it and tell your WordPress friends.
